name: Beyond the Horizon
landing_text: Welcome Aventurer, to Beyond the Horizon, a modpack that encourages you to get out and explore, build, and automate with tech and magic.$(br2)Don't worry about building a base for the first night because no mobs spawn in the open air of the overworld!$(br2)There's a lot in this Journal. Start with '$(l:backstory)Your Story$()' in The Beginning.
